title: [Silken Mist, Deck]
description: Several softly padded lounge chairs rest here, allowing passengers a place to sit and enjoy the view.  The soft sound of a harp fills the air, its silken tones carrying throughout the entire ship and providing a soft musical backdrop to the cruise.

Several softly padded lounge chairs have been neatly stacked against one wall so that the strolling passengers can circle the deck without obstruction.  The soft sound of a harp fills the air, its silken tones carrying throughout the entire ship and providing a soft musical backdrop to the cruise.
